title: Van Gogh-inspired homepage with unified navigation and expandable sections

requirements.summary: Generate Van Gogh-inspired background image for homepage hero section
acceptanceCriteria: Background image features swirling, vibrant colors reminiscent of Van Gogh's style
Brushstroke textures are visible and artistic
Image dimensions are 1920x1080 for optimal display on various screens

file_operations.description: Generate Van Gogh-inspired background image with vibrant swirling colors (yellows, blues, greens) and prominent brushstroke textures at 1920x1080 dimensions for the homepage hero section

requirements.summary: Create unified HomePage component with Van Gogh-inspired design and CSS effects
acceptanceCriteria: CSS gradient effects create additional swirling visual elements
Color scheme uses vibrant Van Gogh-inspired colors (yellows, blues, greens)
Page maintains a cohesive, unified artistic feel throughout
Background image is rendered from generated asset in frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Replace existing HomePage with a new unified Van Gogh-inspired design that uses the generated background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/vangogh-hero.dim_1920x1080.png. Add CSS gradient overlays and effects to create swirling brushstroke visual elements using vibrant Van Gogh colors (yellows, blues, greens). Include three prominent main menu options (Browse Books, Mood-Based Recommendations, Trending & Popular) and a secondary menu (Collection, Upload Book, My Books, Favorites). Implement expandable sections for Mood-Based Recommendations and Trending & Popular that display content without navigation. Ensure only one section expands at a time and handle authentication state using useInternetIdentity hook.

Add Van Gogh-inspired CSS custom properties and gradient definitions for swirling brushstroke effects. Define vibrant color variables (yellows, blues, greens) that complement the Van Gogh theme. Add utility classes for text contrast and overlay effects to ensure typography stands out against the colorful background.

requirements.summary: Implement three prominent main menu options with navigation and expandable content
acceptanceCriteria: Three options are visually prominent and clearly labeled
Browse Books navigates to the existing /browse route
Mood-Based Recommendations expands a section below showing mood filters and filtered books
Trending & Popular expands a section below showing trending books using existing useTrendingBooks hook
Expanded sections appear smoothly without page navigation
Only one section can be expanded at a time

file_operations.description: Implement three main menu options as prominent interactive elements: Browse Books (Link to /browse), Mood-Based Recommendations (expands MoodFilterChips and filtered books using useMoodFilter and useBooks hooks), and Trending & Popular (expands trending books using useTrendingBooks hook). Add state management to track which section is expanded and ensure only one section can be expanded at a time. Use smooth transitions for expand/collapse animations.
Update MoodFilterChips component styling to integrate with Van Gogh theme colors and ensure visibility against the artistic background. Maintain existing mood selection functionality.

requirements.summary: Add secondary menu with platform feature links integrated into homepage design
acceptanceCriteria: Secondary menu contains four links: Collection (/browse), Upload Book (/upload), My Books (/my-books), Favorites (/favorites)
Links are styled consistently with the Van Gogh theme
Menu is visually distinct but complementary to the three main options
All links navigate to their respective existing routes

file_operations.description: Add a secondary menu section below or beside the main menu options containing four navigation links: Collection (to /browse), Upload Book (to /upload), My Books (to /my-books), and Favorites (to /favorites). Style the menu to be visually distinct yet complementary to the main options, using Van Gogh-inspired colors and maintaining clear hierarchy.

requirements.summary: Configure homepage as personalized dashboard for logged-in users
acceptanceCriteria: Logged-in users see personalized recommendations when Mood-Based Recommendations is expanded
Trending & Popular section uses existing trending books logic
Authentication state is checked using useInternetIdentity hook
Non-authenticated users see public content or prompts to log in

file_operations.description: Integrate personalized content for authenticated users using useInternetIdentity hook. When Mood-Based Recommendations is expanded and user is authenticated, fetch and display personalized recommendations using usePersonalizedRecommendations hook. For non-authenticated users, show public trending books or login prompts. Use existing useTrendingBooks hook for Trending & Popular section. Conditionally render content based on authentication state.

requirements.summary: Style typography to maintain readability against Van Gogh-inspired background
acceptanceCriteria: Text has sufficient contrast against colorful backgrounds
Font choices are consistent throughout the homepage
Typography complements the artistic Van Gogh aesthetic
Spacing between elements maintains visual hierarchy and readability

file_operations.description: Apply typography styles with high contrast text colors and text shadows to ensure readability against the vibrant Van Gogh background. Use consistent font families from Tailwind config (Crimson Text for headings, Inter for body). Implement proper spacing and visual hierarchy with Tailwind utility classes.

Define CSS utility classes for high-contrast typography optimized for Van Gogh-inspired colorful backgrounds. Add text shadow utilities and color classes that ensure readability while complementing the artistic theme. Maintain consistent spacing variables.

requirements.summary: Update App.tsx routing to use new unified homepage as default route
acceptanceCriteria: Root route '/' displays the new Van Gogh-inspired unified homepage
Authenticated user experience integrates personalized content
All existing routes remain functional
Navigation component continues to work with the new homepage

file_operations.description: Verify the root route '/' is configured to render the updated HomePage component. Ensure the new unified Van Gogh-inspired homepage serves as the default landing page while maintaining all existing route definitions (/browse, /book/:isbn, /admin, /upload, /my-books, /admin/review, /favorites). No changes to route structure are needed; the updated HomePage component will handle personalized vs public views internally.
